Nothing inspires me more than to operate in a goal- and result driven working environment, anchored in a strong individual and team leadership setting. Asking the right questions and empowering people to realize their potential is one of my fortes. Trust, openness and honesty are characteristic for my leadership style, fuelling happiness, personal growth and high performances in my teams.
- Fast forward thinking and acting to impact
- A highly engaged professional and mature Management Team
- I prosper in a change driven business to challenge the status quo.
Royal Netherlands Marines, Ahold Delhaize, TNT/FedEx, Startup/Scaleup
And next to all this ‚Äúbusiness violence‚Äù the most important, family. Meditation, Mountaineering and Tour skiing. As often as possible and go beyond Natural Limits. :-)
